All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Alert
An abstract class for displaying alert messages.
CanvasController
An abstract class for controlling a canvas.
ComboBoxController
An abstract class for controlling a combo box.
Controller
The Controller class is responsible for handling user input and managing the display of segments on a canvas.
Heap
The Heap class provides static methods for heapifying an ArrayList of Segments, which can be used for sorting the segments based on their y-coordinates in descending order.
HeapTest
Testing of the class Heap
MainApplication
The `MainApplication` class is a JavaFX application class that extends the `Application` class.
PrioritySearchTree
Original Priority Search Tree
PrioritySearchTreeE
Extension of a priority search tree for which the coordinates of the segments have been exchanged, i.e. the X and Y have been swapped.
PrioritySearchTreeO
Extension of a priority search tree for which the coordinates of the segments were all opposite, i.e.
PrioritySearchTreeOE
Extension of a priority search tree for which the coordinates of the segments have been swapped and opposed, i.e. the X and Y have been swapped and then opposed.
PrioritySearchTreeTest
Testing of the class PstWrapper
PSTNode
A class representing a node in a priority search tree.
PstWrapper
Wrapper class for Priority Search Trees that provides efficient windowing for specific types of windows.
Segment
A class representing a line segment with a start point (x,y) and an end point (xPrime, yPrime).
SegmentController
An abstract class for controlling segments on a canvas.
SegmentCreator
A class for creating random segments and writing them to files.
SegmentTest
Testing of the class Segment
TestMain
 
Utility
A utility class providing methods for manipulating arrays of Segment objects.
UtilityTest1
Testing of the class Utility
UtiltyTest2
Testing of the class Utility
WindowController
An abstract class for controlling window on a canvas.
